channel.title: Comments on: Space heater * power strip = support disaster
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.dc:creator: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.content:encoded:
we had to install airconditioning because of the 2 servers and 7 computers that are in there.

ANd let’s not forget myself.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
I have 3 workstations under my desk, they provide plenty of heat thank you very much ðŸ™‚

Yeah people never apologize when they are wrong like that because they are too embarrassed or just plain oblivious

item.title: By: pmch22
item.dc:creator: pmch22
item.description: Space heaters should be banned at work. May be an extra jacket or sweater would help to stay warm!<br />
item.content:encoded: Space heaters should be banned at work. May be an extra jacket or sweater would help to stay warm!
